DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate long-term safety tolerability atrasentan 10 mg men hormone refractory prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: A Long Term Safety Study With Atrasentan
DOC.criteria: Greater equal 18 year , inclusive ; Subject currently active atrasentan clinical study OR histologically cytologically document diagnosis prostate adenocarcinoma consider hormone refractory ; Karnofsky Performance Score great equal 60 ; Adequate hematologic function liver function test ; No New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class great equal 2 .
